issue.title: Add zsh support to C++ build scripts
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-64](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-64). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
All scripts that have to be sourced during development currently only support bash. This patch adds zsh support.
